At Sercan Aslan Hair Transplant Clinic, we prioritize excellence in every aspect of your journey:

• International Support: We provide complete assistance for international patients including airport transfers, hotel accommodation, and multilingual support.

all_questions.question: How long does a hair transplant procedure take?
all_questions.answer: A hair transplant typically takes between 6 to 8 hours, depending on the number of grafts required.

all_questions.question: Is the hair transplant procedure painful?
all_questions.answer: The procedure is performed under local anesthesia, so you won’t feel any pain during the process. Mild discomfort may be experienced afterward, which is manageable with medication.

all_questions.question: When will I see the final results?
all_questions.answer: Initial hair growth starts around 3 to 4 months after the procedure. Full results are usually visible within 9 to 12 months.

all_questions.question: Will the transplanted hair fall out?
all_questions.answer: The transplanted hair will initially shed after 2–3 weeks — this is completely normal. The new permanent hair starts growing in the following months.

all_questions.question: Is the hair transplant permanent?
all_questions.answer: Yes, the transplanted hair is taken from the donor area (usually the back of the head), which is genetically resistant to hair loss. The results are permanent.

all_questions.question: Do you offer accommodation and airport transfers?
all_questions.answer: Yes, we provide VIP airport pickup, hotel accommodation, and full travel support for our international patients.

all_questions.question: Can I go back to work after the procedure?
all_questions.answer: Most patients can return to work within 3 to 5 days, depending on the nature of their job. You’ll receive detailed post-op instructions for a smooth recovery.
